title: Google Calendar removes Pride Month and Black History Month
author: Chantelle Billson
description: Google Calendar has removed dates for Black History Month, Pride Month and Women’s History Month amid a wider diversity rollback.
sitename: PinkNews | Latest lesbian, gay, bi and trans news | LGBTQ+ news
cntitle: Google 日历移除骄傲月和黑人历史月
cndescription: 在更广泛的多元化倒退中，Google 日历已经删除了黑人历史月、骄傲月和女性历史月的日期。
